docs.text: Cookiecutter Data Package Project template for creation of frictionless data packages . Installation git make Python (with packages cookiecutter and pip-tools ) Docker (optional) Usage To create a new data package run cookiecutter https://github.com/splor-mg/cookiecutter-datapackage.git project_slug: project Creating virtual environment... Running pip compile... Initializing Git repository... Initialized empty Git repository in ~/project/.git/ cd ~/project/ source venv/bin/activate pip install -r requirements.txt data extraction metadata (data package, schemas and dialect) transform and build pipeline scheduled jobs validation and checks publish Maintenance Dependencies Secrets DOCKERHUB_TOKEN DOCKERHUB_USERNAME
